Template.Name: SmartHotel360
Template.Description: This template contains work items, code and pipeline definitions for the public web site of SmartHotel360, an E2E reference sample app with several consumer and line-of-business apps and an Azure backend. For more information, please see the project page on GitHub
Template.Message:
Note that the code for the SmartHotel 360 Website hosted on GitHub is not imported into Azure Repos. The CI pipeline just points to the code on GitHub.
Template required follwoing extensions, please install those before you use this template, ignore if already done.
  • ARM Outputs
  • Team Project Health

Template.Name: PartsUnlimited
Template.Description: Use this lab to provision a scrum based team project containing sample work items, complete source code and pipeline definitions to deploy Parts Unlimited, a sample eCommerce website based on the The Phoenix Project book by Gene Kim. See the home page of the project on GitHub
